actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize improved flood protection on portions of the West Branch of the Susquehanna River in Lock Haven, Pennsylvania and environs.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to implement the project for flood damage prevention on the West Branch of the Susquehanna River, at Lock Haven, Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A bill to authorize improved flood protection on portions of the West Branch of the Susquehanna River in Lock Haven, Pennsylvania and environs.
